name: Alex YTLite Source
subtitle: Alex YTLitePlus Altstore source.
description:
This is Alex's Altstore source for YTLitePlus.

YTLitePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks.

For full details on what's included, check the GitHub repository:

https://github.com/alextay-ideagen/YTLite

apps.name: YTLitePlus
apps.subtitle: YTLite with more features!
apps.versionDescription:
• Updated YouTube to v20.15.1
 • YTLitePlus is using 5.0.1
 • iOS/iPadOS 15.0 or later required

Features included:
 • YTLite core features
 • YTUHD for higher resolutions
 • YouPiP for Picture-in-Picture
 • YTABConfig for A/B settings
 • YouMute for audio control
 • DontEatMyContent for notch/Dynamic Island
 • Return YouTube Dislikes
 • iSponsorBlock for skipping sponsors
 • YouRememberCaption for captions
 • YTNoTracking for privacy
 • YTUnShorts for better Shorts experience
 • YTNoCheckLocalNetwork
 • BigYTMiniPlayer
 • YTSpeed and YTHoldForSpeed
 • YTVideoOverlay
 • YouQuality for quality control
 • YTNoModernUI
 • OLEDDarkmode and OLDDarkmode
 • LowContrastMode
 • YTNoSuggestedVideo

Credits to all contributors and developers
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features!

YTLitePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks :

• YTLite
• YTUHD
• YouPiP
• YTABConfig
• YouMute
• DontEatMyContent
• Return YouTube Dislikes
• iSponsorBlock
• YouRememberCaption
• YTNoTracking
• YTUnShorts
• YTNoCheckLocalNetwork
• BigYTMiniPlayer
• YTSpeed
• YTHoldForSpeed
• YTVideoOverlay
• YouQuality
• YTNoModernUI
• OLEDDarkmode
• OLDDarkmode
• LowContrastMode
• YTNoSuggestedVideo

Credit

@Balackburn, @bhackel, @Deci8BelioS, @matt911, @arichornloverALT, @Macleykun, @AlexInABox, @SKEIDs, @VictorxD70, @Glenta, @zSaaiq, @MrAlucardDante, @gototheskinny, @asdfzxcvbn, @dayanch96, @ssuesskind, @MiRO92, @qnblackcat, @PoomSmart, @level3tjg, @BandarHL, @Galactic-Dev, @julioverne, @hbang, @Lyvendia, @therealFoxster, @ichitaso, @AhmedBafkir, @CokePokes, @ISnackable

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YTLitePlus will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Updated YouTube to v20.15.1
 • YTLitePlus is using 5.0.1
 • iOS/iPadOS 15.0 or later required

Features included:
 • YTLite core features
 • YTUHD for higher resolutions
 • YouPiP for Picture-in-Picture
 • YTABConfig for A/B settings
 • YouMute for audio control
 • DontEatMyContent for notch/Dynamic Island
 • Return YouTube Dislikes
 • iSponsorBlock for skipping sponsors
 • YouRememberCaption for captions
 • YTNoTracking for privacy
 • YTUnShorts for better Shorts experience
 • YTNoCheckLocalNetwork
 • BigYTMiniPlayer
 • YTSpeed and YTHoldForSpeed
 • YTVideoOverlay
 • YouQuality for quality control
 • YTNoModernUI
 • OLEDDarkmode and OLDDarkmode
 • LowContrastMode
 • YTNoSuggestedVideo

Credits to all contributors and developers

YTLitePlus v20.02.3 (2024-08-14)

Current YouTube IPA: "20.02.3"
Current YTLite Version: "4.0.1"
Compatibility: iOS/iPadOS 15.0 or later

New Features:
• YouTimeStamp - Copy video URL with timestamp
• Copy/Paste Settings - Share your settings easily
• Reporting Option - Enhanced user feedback
• Live Chat OLED Dark Mode - Better dark mode for live chats
• Hide Speed Toast - Cleaner UI

Bug Fixes:
• Fixed building on iOS 14
• Fixed dylib injection issues
• Fixed YouTube Extensions
• Fixed delete workflows
• Fixed localization and copy/paste switch
• Fixed LowContrastMode description
• Fixed build errors
• Fixed OLED live chat

Improvements:
• Cleaned up Makefile and actions script
• Default disabled big mini player
• Hide comment previews
• Hide autoplay mini preview
• Removed YTLitePlus OLED Theme
• Added Hide HUD and Hide Collapse Button

Localization Updates:
• Turkish localization
• Bulgarian translations
• Portuguese updates
• Added missing strings
• Updated Localizable.strings

Known Issues:
• LowContrastMode not working (Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2-v17.38.10)
• YouTube crashing when viewing Shorts

Credits to all contributors and developers for their amazing work.
